response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that promises to deliver exceptional value over time. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering you the opportunity to own this product for $12,000, which I believe is a fair and competitive price given its market value and the benefits it offers.
